title: Every Cloud Has a Silver Lining
description:
As Abby begins the school year, she has a specific goal in mind. She wants to be a soccer star. Though many obstacles stand in her way, Abby sets out to develop her seemingly hidden talent for soccer.Book Details: 
   Format: Paperback 
   Publication Date: 8/1/2000 
   Pages: 128 
   Reading Level: Age 8 and Up
author: Anne Mazer
